summary.commentary_synthesized: Good general demand for the 5.19 M/Kgs. Quality marginally lower. [Ex-Estate: 0.68 M/Kgs] Best Westerns firm to dearer. Below Best irregular. Plainer sorts firm. Nuwara Eliyas gained. Uda Pussellawas irregular. Uva seasonal teas sold well, others irregular. [CTC] H&M BP1s irregular/easier. PF1s firm to dearer. LG BP1s irregular. PF1s firm/dearer. [Low Grown: 2.2 M/Kgs] Fair demand. Select Best BOP1/OP1s firm/dearer, Below Best easier. OPs/OPAs irregular. Pekoe bold irregular, Pekoe1s firm/dearer. FBOPs/FF1s irregular. Premium catalogue good demand. [Source: F&W]
